project_descr: Building Capacity to Eliminate POPs (Persistent Organic Pollutants) Pesticides Stockpiles in Vietnam

outputs.output_descr: The project is to remove capacity barriers to the sustainable elimination of POPs (Persistent Organic Pollutants) Pesticides in Vietnam.
